ygData.subject: Re: but can they be looted????
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lore items aren t necessarily no drop/no trade.  My Mistmoore shield is a Lore item that I routinely bank, loan to my bard friend, etc. As for when loot
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 11 Aug 1999, Chas Watkins wrote:

> With the introduction of LORE items. That is the No drop/No trade items.

Lore items aren't necessarily no drop/no trade. My Mistmoore shield is
a Lore item that I routinely bank, loan to my bard friend, etc.

As for when loot can be taken. Yes, lore items can be taken; no, nodrop
items cannot be taken. And items can only be taken in a PvP venue; in a
duel, there's no looting.
--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
